1.故事的世界观如何？（What is the world view of the story?）
2.主要人物的特点和发展如何？（What are the characteristics and development of the main characters?）
3.故事的结构和发展如何？（What is the structure and development of the story?）
4.魔幻元素的设计和使用如何？（How to design and use magical elements?）
5.语言和风格如何？（What is the language and style?）
